title: Some of our voices
brief_description: A special television program dramatising the growth of cultural centres throughout the United States. The program includes performances by Leonard Bernstein, Harry Belafonte, Marian Anderson, Pable Casals and other important performing artists from the ballet and repertory theatre. Narrated by John Forsythe.
